notes.text:
Use very fresh, sushi-grade fish
Wet hands when handling rice
Sharp knife is essential for clean cuts

steps.descr: Cook sushi rice, mix with rice vinegar while warm

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by cooking the sushi rice. Once it's cooked, mix it with rice vinegar while it's still warm. You'll love the aroma!

steps.instructions: Cook sushi rice, mix with rice vinegar while warm

steps.descr: Let rice cool to room temperature

on_enter.say: Now, let's let the rice cool down to room temperature. This will take about 10 minutes. Perfect time to get everything else ready!

steps.instructions: Let rice cool to room temperature

on_enter.say: Great! Now place a sheet of nori on your bamboo mat. Make sure it's nice and flat.

steps.descr: Spread rice over nori, leaving 2cm at top

on_enter.say: Let's spread the rice over the nori, leaving about 2cm at the top. Use wet hands to prevent sticking!

steps.instructions: Spread rice over nori, leaving 2cm at top

steps.descr: Add salmon, avocado, cucumber in a line

on_enter.say: Now, add the salmon, avocado, and cucumber in a neat line across the rice. This is where the magic happens!

steps.instructions: Add salmon, avocado, cucumber in a line

on_enter.say: Let's roll it up tightly using the mat. Keep it snug and you'll have a perfect roll!

steps.descr: Slice into pieces and serve with condiments

on_enter.say: Finally, slice your sushi roll into pieces and serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger. Enjoy your homemade sushi!

steps.instructions: Slice into pieces and serve with condiments

recipe.title: Sushi Rolls
recipe.description: Fresh homemade sushi with salmon, avocado, and cucumber
